a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate from cardiovascular diseases vs. GDP per capita, 2021

The estimated death rate from
cardiovascular diseases
per 100,000 people in the population, compared to the
country's GDP per capita, adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.

Cardiovascular diseases death rate
(deaths per 100,000 people)

Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, the death rate metric is
age-standardized
. GDP per capita is expressed in
